com.dropoutdesign.ddf.module
Class ReliableModule

java.lang.Object
  com.dropoutdesign.ddf.module.Module
      com.dropoutdesign.ddf.module.ReliableModule

public class ReliableModule
extends Module

Subclass of Module that provides automatic recovery from errors.

Field Summary

          Default wait time to before attempting to re-establish the connection.

isConnected

public boolean isConnected()
Return the cannonical connection status of this module. The value returned is independent of whether the connection is currently broken due to an error.

Overrides:

hasError

public boolean hasError()
Return the current error status of this module.

connect

public void connect()
Connect to this module, retrying until sucessful. This method attempts to connect once and returns, but will attempt to reconnect upon later calls to writeFrame if necessary.

Overrides:
connect in class Module
